channel.title: How do i get people to connect?
channel.description: i can log in on the server and its fine but my bro trys to log in and he can't. can anyone help me?

item.title: How do i get people to connect?
item.dc:creator: @mprules mprules
item.description:
@mprules wrote:

Well are you using hamachi to host it?

Heres what you need to do…
Step 1: Go to http://www.hamachi.cc and download the free version of it. ( you can skip that registration part too)

Step 2: Click the button that looks like a triangle and click create new network.

Step 3: make a name and password…

Step 4: Give the name and pass to your bro and then your bro will have to join the hamachi network…

Step 4: Once hes in , give him the ip on the top of hamachi page…

Step 5: (this parts for your bro) Go to moparscape and go to file new server and paste in that ip you gave him.

Step 6: go to file new port and enter the port… Default 43594

Step 7: Log in and enjoy your play.

Read full topic
